title: kAppATra nEram
sahitya:
kAppATra nEran idE en pashi tIrak-karuNai shei AramudE


anupallavi

  pArppanAyirundu pAviyait-tINDAyO paTriya vIDaNaikkap-pancAngam vENDumO


caraNam    duTTarAyinum unnait-turandu nAn pizhaippEnO tOr-kanraik-kATTinum pAr-pashu karakkAdO
toTTut-toTTup-pArttAl tOTTiyum uravAmE tonru toTT-onrAga ninra nI karavAmE
